channel.title: Need Help Adding Items
channel.description:
I was just wondering could anyone tell me where to find a complete tutorial on how I add new items to my server? I have never done it before, so i have no clue how to start.
Example: I have a skillcape shop, but all the items in shop say "null" so i need to know how to add new items to my server like skillcapes.
and also a guide adding custom items, like wings would help too. :) Thanks!

item.title: Need Help Adding Items
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

The items appear to be in your server already if there is a shop for them, just the models are not in your client. If possible, try downloading the client designed for your source, if not, then just add the models.

I googled “How to add custom items” and the first 3 results should do fine. This link might not work, if not, google.

RaGEZONE - MMO development community

TUT} How To Add Custom Items{TUT - RaGEZONE - MMO development community

Hello everybody, I am going to teach you how to actually add custom items. These items are not recolors, and are actual NEW items. Before you attempt this, please be sure you h

Read full topic
